profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 17:44:23 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The Archives of American art does not own the original papers. Use is limited to the microfilm copy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Resumes; letters, 1969-1977, from museums, colleges and universities and others; a letter from Tiemann to the SAN ANTONIO EXPRESS about art criticism, 1977; newspaper and magazine clippings about Tiemann's works of art; newspaper clippings of reviews by Tiemann in the SAN ANTONIO EXPRESS; printed material; posters; a brochure about Trinity University's Department of Art; a bulletin from the Roswell Museum and Art Center, 1971; newsletters from Laguna Gloria Art Museum, Austin, Texas, and the College of Fine and Applied Arts, University of Texas at San Antonio, 1974 and 1980; photographs of Tiemann, his works and gallery installations; and a cover illustration by Tiemann, 1980.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reel 3308 available for use only at the Museum of Fine Arts, Houston and through interlibrary loan.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals returned to the lender, Robert Tiemann, after microfilming.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Painter, sculptor, critic, educator; San Antonio, Texas.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Microfilmed as part of the Archives of American Art's Texas project.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Lent for microfilming 1982 by Robert Tiemann.
